scenario.property: DC Receiving and Shipping Scenario - Table
This scenario performs DC Shipping and Receiving activity for fixed Table

activity.name: SetNoStoreInfoReadError
activity.input: "Store id part of barcode is missing"

var.name: ${process.scenarioName}
var.property: Scenario Instance name for UI display

var.name: ${process.asnExpected}
var.property: Specify if UI display should be ON.

var.name: ${process.asnMode}
var.property: <option SELECTED value="BARCODE">Verification-ASN in DB</option> <option value="WMS">Verification-ASN from WMS</option> <option value="LOCAL">Identification-Scenario creates ASN</option>

var.name: ${process.multiBoxSupport}
var.property: Will multiple physical cartons be present for an ASN with one logical carton?

var.name: ${process.poNumber}
var.property: Specify if purchare order number scan is needed

var.name: ${process.stopIndicator}
var.property: Specify option to complete/close a carton
<option SELECTED value="TIMEOUT">Use a timeout to indicate carton is completed</option> <option value="SUBBUTTON">Click Submit button to indicate carton is completed</option>

var.name: ${process.stopTime}
var.property: Specify the time in milliseconds to complete/close a carton

var.name: ${process.generateASN}
var.property: Specify if ASN is to be distributed after completing a carton

var.name: ${process.defaultShipToDescBarcodeMode}
var.property: Specify default destination for carton (if destination is not available for shipping usecases)

var.name: ${process.locSubType}
var.property: Specify sub-location within store for auto-receive of items (applies only for virtual ASN)

var.name: ${process.historyLength}
var.property: Number of cartons' contents to retain (to filter cross-reads)

var.name: ${process.configDevicePointForStart}
var.property: <option value="01">01</option> <option value="02">02</option> <option value="03">03</option> <option value="04">04</option> <option value="05">05</option> <option value="06">06</option> <option value="07">07</option> <option value="08">08</option>

var.name: ${process.configDevicePointEpcForEnd}
var.property: <option value="01">01</option> <option value="02">02</option> <option value="03">03</option> <option value="04">04</option> <option value="05">05</option> <option value="06">06</option> <option value="07">07</option> <option value="08">08</option>

var.name: ${process.transitLocation}
var.property: Specify business location to assign EPCs

var.name: ${process.transitLocationRP}
var.property: Specify initial read point to assign EPCs
